Text: Also, you're supposed to cut the end of it. You know, the part where it says "Download this song on iTunes".
Sigh... And no ID tags either...

Haha, thanks ;) Nah, I was just surprised, that's all.
ID-Tags are tags like the name, artist, album etc, which a media player can read and implement. It's virtually required to use in a torrent, as a lot of players can't make the name and artist up from the file name.
A program like Stamp ID3 Tag Editor can create ID tags for mp3 files.
Audacity. Free and awesome, but don't forget to set the output audio at 320 kbps (It's 128 default)
